string.text: Dead Scientists' documents
Judging from these records, the Scientists were transporting a very unusual artefact...
Krysjuk's PDA
Krysjuk kept valuable information in his PDA. Borov wants it back...
Borov's stash
Borov said that there'll be something to gain from this...
Counterfeit vodka
Vodka
There once was a trader in this area trying to sell off cheap vodka. The locals made him drink it... Now he sells it to down and out spirits...
Radioactive bread
'Bread'
Once a normal loaf of bread, but now just a radioactive piece of shit... If you're sick of living, go ahead and eat it...
Krysjuk's stash
Krysjuk's stash full of loot...
Hello, my friend... want to have a chat?
Sure. Do you have anything to drink?
Very well, let's take a seat and finish a bottle
Well, let's quench our thirst!
Sounds good to me!...
What a shame...we finished off the bottle already...
That went down smooth... thanks for the drink... I'm getting a good buzz...
Have you heard about any good loot?
I will tell you, friend...Recently I found a PDA on a corpse, there was info on it about hidden loot. I'm in no shape to go look for it, you can have it...
Well, how interesting can it be?... this isn't exactly the French Riviera, in case you haven't noticed...
Thanks for the tip...
Maybe you will hear something later...
How's life treating you? Want to chat?
Sure, I've got nothing better to do at the moment...
Out here... there's nothing better to do...
Let's share a bottle, and exchange stories then...
Come on then, let's get to it then...
I would if I had any...
Let's have one for the boys...
So comrade, have you heard about any swag?
I did overhear some talk about a cache... It's too far away to interest me, you can check it out if you like...
Nothing recently, check back with me another time...
I'll check it out if I go there...
Another time then...
Hello, soldier of fortune!
Greetings, Stalker. Borov has ordered us not to mess with you, but don't try anything stupid...
No need to be so serious. When's the last time you drank some real vodka?
Too damn long, pour me a glass and I'll be grateful...
Thats the spirit, lets drink as brothers!
Damn, I thought I had a bottle...
Mmmm, that really hit the spot! You're alright, Stalker...
Any information from your prisoners? Any stash locations?

Yesterday, we took three Duty soldiers prisoner. Once we started to interogate them, one of them says - "Brothers, this is not necessary. I can show you where some loot is located"... We thought it was bullshit because he can't give an exact location, but he says he can take us there... He claimed it was close by, but we thought he was trying to lead us into an ambush. See what you think...
Nothing I can share with you!
Maybe it was just a story, but you never know...
Maybe next time you will be more generous to those that share their vodka...
Wow, I haven't seen you in ages... How have you been?
I got very drunk last night and things are still blurry, but I don't remember meeting you...
What you need is another drink to clear your mind...
Another swig always does the trick...
Let's drink to your health!
Damn! All I have is an empty bottle...
U-u-uh... my health is getting better with every drop...
Now that you're feeling better, is there any hiding places you know about?

Don't speak so loudly, I watched Borov execute six men he suspected of stealing from him... I know of a stash, but I dont dare take it. If you get caught...I dont know you. Stop by later and I might have something else
All Borov's caches have been found or moved. He doesn't trust anybody...
I won't rat you out!
That's okay, I have to go now...
Greetings, brother... How is it going for you?
This place is not what I expected... Does it ever get easier?
Yes and no. Let's talk over a drink. You'll feel better...
A drink is just what I need...
Well here's to the Zone...
Poured himself a man...
Strong... Cures all that ails me... My worries are fading...
Do you have you any leads on hidden loot? I don't mind travelling...

Recently, Wolf pulled a stalker out of an anomaly, not much of him remained... But... in his backpack was a note with co-ordinates. It appears he had hidden loot there... But Wolf told me I'm not experienced enough to go there. Here's the co-ordinates - write them down...
No, I just came here recently and have not ventured very deep into the zone... Come back in a week. Maybe by then I will have something to share...
Thanks for the tip... I will have a look...
That is fine, we will talk again later...
Hello, how is life treating you?
Hello... So-so. It could be better...
Would a stiff drink put a smile on that face?...
It sure would! My luck has already changed for the better...
Let's drink to bravery and good fortune!...
Shit, I'll have to get more vodka from Sid...
Yes, to bravery! and to the fallen... May our fortunes rise together!
Speaking of good fortune... Do you have any information to share?

Recently a pair of stalkers came to see Sid... I was sleeping right outside Sid's door at the time. Well, I was not actually sleeping, I could hear what was going on ... They wanted to buy some equipment on credit, claiming they knew of a rich cache and that payment would be made when they retreived the goods. They even described the place where it was hidden... But Sid would not give them anything. I thought I would go get it myself, but I dont have all the necessary gear... Here is the place...If you find a lot of loot - don't forget about me...
Nothing to tell really. Good fortune is a campfire and a hot meal...
If it's a good stash, I'll not forget you...
Maybe you will hear something later...
Why so gloomy? Do you need any help?
Is this place supposed to be fun? I'm having a bad day...
Well let's change the mood, a drink will help...
Aha, that's more like it! This will certainly help...
So... let's drink to... to HOPE!
Shit! NO! I remember I had a bottle! And now it's gone!
Thanks for making my day. It's good to know there are people like you in the Zone...
Now that we're relaxed - do you know if there's any loot hidden nearby? Have you heard anything?
Yes, I have heard something, but it's far from here... Several have gone to find the loot, but none have returned. I will show you on the map - here...
No, I've not heard anything... I don't listen in to others' private conversations...
I won't go out of my way for it, but if I'm nearby - I'll take a look...
Well, the old saying is true. The less you know - the better you sleep...
Hello, my friend... How's your day?
Hello... I've not slept good for about a week. I've been having nightmares ever since my friend Vayazma got killed by boars...
It sounds like you need a good dose of vodka for your nerves...
That would help. Do you have any?
Of course I do... Lets drink to Vayazma!
I forgot to bring any with me... I'll come back later...
That's just what I needed! I'm already feeling better... I've got a real buzz!
Standard doctor's medicine... So, have you heard of any hiding places in the zone?

The day before yesterday with some soldiers I shared a couple of bottles with. They usually stay in the Agroprom, but quite often run over here as Sid supplies them with their vodka... So, they told me that they have caught a zombified stalker! The commander ordered to take the creature alive, so they can sell it to some egg heads in the Great Land for experiments. If it was me, a bullet in a temple of it's head would have been better....Well, on this zombie's right hand was some sort of tattoo...but not a normal one, it was like someone cut a drawing into his flesh...a drawing of a map...
I've heard talk of anomalies, and monsters, but nothing about loot. Everybody is keeping their secrets to themselves. Stop by another time and maybe I'll have something for you...
Yes, damn, it is better to... No pain...
I will return, then we'll talk...
Hello, brother... How are things going here?
Another long day of keeping mutants at bay... I'd rather have another assignment...
Come for the knowledge...? Or superiors will not allow it?
Yes, some bosses... Prapor ours - an old soldier, understands that in the zone without it impossible. So, do not menzhuysya, pour.
Well! For good people!...
Would be poured, but the last half-liter had to spend on health...
For us, that is! Eat, that's sausage...
Thanks... What's the news here? Maybe some news?

Special no news... But, of the Max Lubero heard? Caught him with korefanom bandyukov from the Dark Valley... Bullet - drugan Lubero, the trail has gone... And before that, said korefan Max managed to reset the card, on which location is indicated with a swag zanykannym... Here! Bullet asked to drive to someone there, but Prapor not allow. They say, and so men at the post a few left... In general, this is the place. Take to the bandits did not get...
Like, did not hear anything special. So... Over little things...
Okay, here you go...
Well, Till you get... I'll see you...
Hail, soldier!
And you there too... Where are you from such a draw?
Yes, so tread softly Zone... You, how about a hundred grams?
What a question! Two hundred grams more will not hurt anyone...
Hold two hundred fifty and no snacks...
I am right now, arts bartender go and come back...
Ha, normul went... Why the snack such nectar...
At exactly good for Mr... only translate... Tell a four-thread...

The other day Bes stayed here, good man, though a lone... No offense, okay?... We did a bit of ammunition helped, talked about - about this... He has nothing of value was not, he talked about the found cache and taken. Khabar, however, was not there... But judging by the signs, there's often someone hides good. If you wish to reconnoiter...
Yes, Che tell... Zone, zone it is. If not, we would have long contagion has spread around the world...
I'll try to explore...
Well am the savior of the world...
Hi, man! Something to your face is familiar. We have never met?
And who knows? I only those friends with anyone, remember...
Come on, not drinking accursed for the sake of friendship for...
Well, like I remember... Come on, pour out!
So... Contains exactly... For the friendship!
Damn! No! I remember exactly, was the bubble! But no!
For trusted friends! With that, even in the Zone is not lost!...
They say you can find near the swag, have not heard?

Do not tell anyone, but you as a friend, I will. There is aiming to nychku one... Accidentally found out about her... Maybe there is nothing, and can swag and dofigischa. If you're a real friend, then share it. I think right?
Not-e, not heard... Collected all that was near and that there is more - only the shooter knows...
About what the conversation! For the other does not feel sorry for...
Shooter? Well, well... I have a question to him, the other...
Hey, let's talk, not against it?
Sit down... Than talking about...
Maybe for the lubrication of five drops?
Zakuson with me, come on, pour what you waiting for?
Keep your glasses equal, and then the edges will not see...
Zakuson that is... Her homeland, no...
Zhzhesh... Oh-oh-oh! Oiled, as oil...
Not lonely here all day to sit?

Well, no. Why miss it? Bar snack rolls, such as paying for security... Singles are often the last to share information... Again, the shoot is on something...\nHohma - 'brother recently oborzeli, the base was satisfied with... So - there is one, the wounded stalker prikidyvatsya, sends SOS to all frequencies. And then a couple Burer it ran into... This 'rennet' as soon as he heard their cries, his legs in his arms and carried, up hill and down dale... Flew straight towards us and with a running start in the prop shed - hryas! Boom, shake, smell - this fan light Khabarov fashioned to the ears... Then everything was shaking, and promised all the load with money supposedly hidden swag and put a mark on the map... Eccentric, to God... We have one ass to risk will not be for some kind of swag. We screen! Protecting the world from evil... If interested, here this his mark...
Sadly of course, but it feels when the case - protecting the world from evil!
Yes, have fun... Look at the case... Although, I think - it's messy...
Well, then I will not distract the hero...
Hello there... How's life treating you?
Bandits killed a, damn it! No nerves are not enough! Climbing and climbing!
Throw pairs... Let's relax a bit...
But I do not boil... Simple, long normal drinking was not... Pour once offered...
Come over tomorrow to see it!
Now at the very empty, swag pritaryus - take from baryg...
Come on! For death from old age!
In the of... Eased Maleh... What do they say?

Everybody is trying to keep himself in his thoughts. ZONE, brother... But I somehow heard that a couple guys leaving the military threw his swag... He was going to profit... Now do not think we'll get there... So, if you want to enjoy. Otherwise, it will disappear altogether. Those guys the other day bandits laid in the next raid... And sorry, good were the stalkers, their plank in the...
Everybody is trying to keep himself in his thoughts. ZONE, brother... Even friends try to avoid guessing at tomorrow... So as not to jinx...
Yes... Many good people are leaving...
That's right. Okay, my friend! Until tomorrow...
What can you do for the shooting was?
We shoot for fear of enemies and yourself...
Come for the bravery of two hundred and fifty?
And pour out!
Hold the two hundred and fifty! So as not to extremes!
Wait a bit... Check that's going on...
Phew! Well, crap, although a strong...
Heh, and you want a lemonade or something? What is interesting news?

Bes and his guys put a dozen looters near the swamp, then I go pay a visit... Corpses, of course, the animal thoroughly consumed, the sight of something else... I look at this mess that glitters is... Stick pulled out a small bottle, very tiny, probably a souvenir - the fifty-gram. Hmm... Apparently, this vampire swallowed it, when the smell of fried... This bottle was a piece of paper, with a card and a note about the secret Khabar... Now this card. Try to Reach, I could not...
Yes, as usual, that an anomaly has disappeared, another shot, and a third generally disappeared without a trace... Here are our 'interesting' news...
If I can get half - yours...
Okay, not limp... Prior to the meeting.
Hello. Do not mind a chat?

I have nothing to sprinkle... If so, you get, and not grounded in vain...
Yes, yes! Come for the kinship of souls!
Sorry, buddy, I also came to an end...
Talk a lot. Drink, as well as life, we must quiet...
Philosopher, damn it! Well, enlighten me how to live to...

Lives each in its own way, and to learn someone else's life is impossible... That Lucky Lev, (heard of him?) All boasted of what he lucky, as the women love him, that all the monsters of his bypass... Have not lived one day, all hid habarok, nychki arranged... Can not drink with him, or to unwind properly. Coast Arty, did not take local huckster, I thought on the mainland to surrender all and live like cheese in butter... And where is he now? Even a piece of hair is left... All dissolved in a Fruit Punch. And now other nychki udachniki looking... And I think - would not be happy with that swag and do not need it for those who like me, lives only one day...
Why do you educate... If there is a way of life, then you will go to them. And no, I did it and not get...

Fate, it means... And I believe in a man...
As it is, buddy?
Yes, little by little, little bit sad, though...
Come for the mood? A little bit?
With your bubble, I've had everything else...
I agree! Let's glasses...
Else and I have, no bubble...
Okay, she-devil! All the insides burned!...
Tell me that something more interesting...

I did hear a story, but I don't think it's true. I will tell you about it... Do you know a Stalker named Eureka? He recently stopped by and said he had just returned from a mission with some skilled stalkers... No telling how long he had been on his drinking binge, we could barely understand what he was saying... Our laughter made him mad, he was flashing his PDA in our faces so we could see his mark on the map to prove his story. Nobody believed him - just another snot nosed rookie from the Cordon ... What do you think?
Che is the language I Zapletal, tomorrow, that'll tell...
Not, would not have believed... Yura - still the whistler...
Then, until tomorrow, pal...
Hello. How are things going?
We have fun, you want to go to the bar, you want - with Dolzhanov triturated. Or betting at the Arena. Many rumors walk. Bar is almost in the center of the Zone is...
Can roll forward on stoparyu? For dating...
